member.name: T:Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint
member.summary: Represents a size constraint that can be enforced on image when resizing.

member.name: F:Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint.Empty
member.summary: Gets a structure that has width, height and maximum width or height of 0.

member.name: P:Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint.WidthComponent
member.summary: Gets the desired image width, in pixels.

member.name: P:Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint.HeightComponent
member.summary: Gets the desired image height, in pixels.

member.name: P:Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint.MaxWidthOrHeightComponent
member.summary: Gets the desired maximum image width or height.

member.name: P:Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint.IsEmpty
member.summary: Tests whether this structure has width, height and maximum width or height of 0.

member.name: M:Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint.Width(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new size constraint that makes the image resize to the specified width. This constraint maintains the aspect ratio. The resized image is never made larger than the original.
member.param: The width of the resized image.
member.returns: The new size constraint that makes the image resize to the specified width.
member.exception: Width is less than or equal to 0.

member.name: M:Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint.Height(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new size constraint that makes the image resize to the specified height. This constraint maintains the aspect ratio. The resized image is never made larger than the original.
member.param: The height of the resized image.
member.returns: The new size constraint that makes the image resize to the specified height.
member.exception: Height is less than or equal to 0.

member.name: M:Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint.Size(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new size constraint that makes the image resize to the specified width and height. This constraint does not maintain the aspect ratio. The resized image is never made larger than the original.
member.param: The width of the resized image.
The height of the resized image.
member.returns: The new size constraint that makes the image resize to the specified width and height.
member.exception: Width or height is less than or equal to 0.

member.name: M:Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint.MaxWidthOrHeight(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new size constraint that makes the image resize to the width and height that do not exceed the specified value. This constraint maintains the aspect ratio. The resized image is never made larger than the original.
member.param: Maximum width or height of the resized image.
member.returns: The new size constraint that makes the image resize to the width and height that do not exceed the specified value.
member.exception: Maximum width or height is less than or equal to 0.

member.name: M:Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint.op_Equality(Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint,Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint)
member.summary: Determines whether two structures are equal.
member.param: The structure on the left side of the equality operator.
The structure on the right side of the equality operator.
member.returns: True if and have equal width, height and maximum width or height; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint.op_Inequality(Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint,Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint)
member.summary: Determines whether two structures are different.
member.param: The structure on the left side of the inequality operator.
The structure on the right side of the inequality operator.
member.returns: True if and differ in width or height or maximum width or height; otherwise, true.

member.name: M:Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified object is a structure with the same width, height and maximum width or height as this structure.
member.param: The object to compare.
member.returns: True if is a and has the same width, height and maximum width or height; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns a hash code for this structure.
member.returns: A hash code for this structure.

member.name: M:Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.SizeConstraint.ToString
member.summary: Creates a human-readable string that represents this structure.
member.returns: A human-readable string that represents this structure.

member.name: T:Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.UrlHelperPreviewMethods
member.summary: Provides extension methods for the extension point .

member.name: M:Kentico.Content.Web.Mvc.UrlHelperPreviewMethods.AuthenticateUrl(Kentico.Web.Mvc.ExtensionPoint{System.Web.Mvc.UrlHelper},System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: When the page preview is active, extends the given by additional authentication information.
member.param: HtmlHelper extension point.
URL that is to be authenticated. The following URL forms will be authenticated: Relative or absolute path. Query string parameters are not included in the authentication hash.
Indicates if readonly mode should be enabled to disallow modify actions and POST requests.
member.returns: If the page preview is active, returns the given extended by authentication information. If the page preview is not active, returns the original .
